comment: /** * Sometimes it's convenient to store an alignment using java collections, * where blocks.get(blockNum).get(0).get(pos) specifies the aligned * residue at position pos of block blockNum of the first * protein. * * This method takes such a collection and stores it into the afpChain's * {@link AFPChain#setOptAln(int[][][]) optAln}, setting the associated * length variables as well. * * @param afpChain * @param blocks */
